T02D2745:129a-0: @129a * // thugs rje chen po rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2745:129a-1: shin tu rnam dag dang ba'i mtshor //
T02D2745:129a-2: rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng //
T02D2745:129a-3: rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D2745:129a-5: lnga rig rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D2745:129a-6: dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud //
T02D2745:129a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i pa'i spyod pa khyad par can
T02D2745:129a-8: la gnas pas snying rje chen po mdun du byas
T02D2745:129a-9: la // thog ma kho nar chod thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2745:129a-10: gdong nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba //
T02D2745:129a-11: gang shar nyid na ngo bo med //
T02D2745:129a-12: chos rnams kun gyis mtshan nyid de //
T02D2745:129a-13: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2745:129a-14: gang 'di ltar ngo bo med pa'i chos 'di dag
T02D2745:129a-15: ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs dka' bas mi shes pa'i
T02D2745:129a-16: 'gro ba lnga po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o
T02D2745:129a-17: zhes brtags nas dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen
T02D2745:129a-18: pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskyod pas /
T02D2745:129a-19: skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu mthug bo gtibs gyur la //
T02D2745:129a-20: tsham tshom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun du rab tu dral zhing yongs su gtor //
T02D2745:129a-21: de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings kyi sna tshogs mdzad pas dbyer med cig car bsgrub pa yi //
T02D2745:129a-22: mgon po dam pa rigs kyi lha lnga bsgrub cing stobs lnga sogs //
T02D2745:129a-23: de la dbus sogs sdong 'dab bcas //
T02D2745:129a-24: zla ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba la //
T02D2745:129a-25: me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam / phrin las sbyar skur bskyed do //
T02D2745:129a-26: rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can ji
T02D2745:129a-27: skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po can
T02D2745:129b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i mdog can ji
T02D2745:129b-2: skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can h'um gi snying po
T02D2745:129b-4: rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btso ma'i mdog can
T02D2745:129b-5: ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can tr'am gi snying
T02D2745:129b-6: po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o //
T02D2745:129b-7: 'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can
T02D2745:129b-8: ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po
T02D2745:129b-10: don yod grub pa s'a lu ljang ba'i mdog can
T02D2745:129b-11: ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can aa:'i snying po
T02D2745:129b-13: 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su //
T02D2745:129b-14: rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la //
T02D2745:129b-15: brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhengs pa //
T02D2745:129b-16: bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang ba gnyis /
T02D2745:129b-17: aom a'a sva p'a r'artha dzny'a na sva bh'a ba shuddha pra k'a sv'a h'a /
